<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ki Center](/Feats.aspx?ID=1759) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
ki spells; [Master of Many Styles](/Feats.aspx?ID=480)

</column>

---

You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power. You cast a single action ki spell with the [stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152) trait, without spending a Focus Point.
name: Ki Center
prerequisite: ki spells; Master of Many Styles
